name: Will of The Hive
description: Blind the player for 3 turns

name: Claimed By Death
description: Deal half attack stat as pure damage, if player is under 15% health before casting then there is a 25% chance they immediately die

name: Steady Block
description: Block 2x your defend stat but don't deal any damage

name: Volley
description: Fire three ranged shots, for each there is a 66% chance to deal 1x your attack stat, block 0.75x of your defense stat of damage

name: Guarded Slice
description: Deal 1.5x your attack stat as penetrating damage and block 0.5x of your defense stat of damage

name: Rough Tussle
description: Deal 1.25x your attack stat as damage and block 1.25x your defense of damage while also having a 50% chance to evade all damage
